sentences.sContent: Married male supervisors were carrying on affairs with female subordinates in the office.
sentences.sCn: 已婚男上司和办公室里的女下级在搞不正当关系。

synos.tran: 事情；事务；私事；（尤指关系不长久的）风流韵事

remMethod.val: af + fair(公平的) → 公平的事件 → 事件

trans.tranCn: 〔非配偶的〕暧昧关系，通奸，私通
trans.tranOther: a secret sexual relationship between two people, when at least one of them is married to someone else
